cluster.name: Green Power
cluster.description: The Green Power cluster defines the format of the commands exchanged when handling GPDs.

command.name: GpNotification
command.description: From GPP to GPS to tunnel GP frame.

command.name: GpPairingSearch
command.description: From GPP to GPSs in entire network to get pairing indication related to GPD for Proxy Table update.

command.name: GpTunnelingStop
command.description: From GPP to neighbor GPPs to indicate GP Notification sent in unicast mode.

command.name: GpCommissioningNotification
command.description: From GPP to GPS to tunnel GPD commissioning data.

command.name: GpSinkCommissioningMode
command.description: To enable commissioning mode of the sink, over the air

command.name: GpTranslationTableUpdate
command.description: To configure GPD Command Translation Table.

command.name: GpTranslationTableRequest
command.description: To provide GPD Command Translation Table content.

command.name: GpSinkTableRequest
command.description: To read out selected Sink Table Entries, by index or by GPD ID.

command.name: GpProxyTableResponse
command.description: To reply with read-out Proxy Table entries, by index or by GPD ID.

command.name: GpNotificationResponse
command.description: From GPS to GPP to acknowledge GP Notification received in unicast mode.

command.name: GpPairing
command.description: From GPS to the entire network to (de)register for tunneling service, or for removing GPD from the network.

command.name: GpProxyCommissioningMode
command.description: From GPS to GPPs in the whole network to indicate commissioning mode.

command.name: GpResponse
command.description: From GPS to selected GPP, to provide data to be transmitted to Rx-capable GPD.

command.name: GpTranslationTableResponse
command.description: To provide GPD Command Translation Table content.

command.name: GpSinkTableResponse
command.description: To selected Proxy Table entries, by index or by GPD ID.

command.name: GpProxyTableRequest
command.description: To request selected Proxy Table entries, by index or by GPD ID.
